article: Coins and Notes exhibition shall be held on 9th and 10th Feb during the Sunama Jakini Maatha annual celebration at Gooty by K.H. Nagaraja Rao, Dharmavaram

All India Are-Katika Marriage Bureau presents Vivaha parichaya for brides and grooms of Are-Katika at 10th Feb 3PM at Shree Sunama Jakini Temple, Gooty. Free registration. Contact 9494131647 or 9880659432 for more details
